Two main tags:

* `#alda`: algorithms and data structrures
* `#sci-oop`: object oriented scientific computing with c++.

## Weekly

* total times:  
```{python}
#| echo: false
!klog report --aggregate=week '08-august.klg'
```

* algorithms and data structures (`#alda`) and oop for scientific computing (`#sci-oop`):
```{python}
#| echo: false
!paste <(klog report --aggregate=week --tag=alda '08-august.klg') <(klog report --aggregate=week\
--tag=sci-oop '08-august.klg')
```



## Daily

* total:
```{python}
#| echo: false
!klog report --tag=study '08-august.klg'
```

* `#alda` and `#sci-oop` side by side;
```{python}
#| echo: false
!paste <(klog report --tag=alda '08-august.klg') <(klog report --tag='sci-oop' '08-august.klg')
```
